description: Detects a TacticalRMM service installation. Tactical RMM is a remote monitoring & management tool.
name: TacticalRMM Service Installation
query: winlog.channel:System AND ((event.code:7045 AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager) AND (winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*tacticalrmm.exe* OR winlog.event_data.ServiceName:*TacticalRMM\ Agent\ Service*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
